item.title: Investment Calculator - Solar Plant
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> InvestementCalculator-full_ingestion HeinrichHartmann.com # @CX-REMOVE import ipynbname nb_name = ipynbname.path().name %%script bash -s $nb_name # @CX-REMOVE # # Export Notebook as Blogpost # ./render.sh ./$1 ./nb.html cat <<EOF > fm.html --- title: Investment Calculator - Solar Plant date: 2023-08-13 tags: inv, post url: /ic outputs: - RawHTML --- EOF cat fm.html nb.html \ > /host/root/home/hhartmann/src/HeinrichHartmann.github.io/hugo/content/posts/raw/ic.html [NbConvertApp] Converting notebook ./InvestementCalculator-full_ingestion.ipynb to HTML [NbConvertApp] Writing 826841 bytes to nb.html # Install Dependencies # @CX-TOGGLE # Run once, then comment out # !
